name: Winner MINeD 2023
text: Received 1st Rank in Open innovation Category and 3rd Rand in grand Prize by Binghamton University.In this 36 hour Hackathon our team is Developed an ai system which helps in surveillance to solve the problems.

name: Winner At Orian Hack 2021
text: We Developed a Hardware System to Prevent an Accident.

name: Winner In NIC 2020
text: Drishti Smart Aid for Blind people.

name: Atmanirbharta COVID-19: Startup competition
text: 2nd Prize, During the hackathon we builded hardware solution for blind People.

name: Winner for National Level COVID-19 E-Hardware Hackathon
text: Winner,During the hackathon we builded hardware solution for social Distancing and Mask Detection.
